I'm not here to write a 100 page essay on what makes Team Fortress 2 a great game. I will say that if you start seeing a bunch of reviews with anywhere from 100 to 1000+ hours, then that might be a good sign.

Really good game that has surprising amounts of depth in terms of the learning curve of each character. Most of the hours I have on this game where on a potato laptop, so the fact it can run on it is a plus. As a side note, other things that have made me fall in love with this game are the outside content: character introduction videos on their YT channel, and specially the comics (which are all free, like the game). Definitely recommended.

P.S. don't fall for it, you do not need to buy any hats. d-o n-o-t b-u-y t-h-e h-a-t-s
Разве шо на S.E.S поиграть мона
Bastante divertido con sus mecanicas y personajes, y a pesar de que no se haya actualizado ultimamente, Tf2 sigue diviritendome :)

Its not just the game that made me recommend this. Its also the community that made this game a timeless masterpiece.

love playing mvm in every gamemode, would recommend + funny hour count

I could never sing enough praise for such an amazing title. I will admit that I am (mostly) a f2p user, but you don't need flashy cosmetics to have a great time here! Learning new strats to use with different classes really makes the game feel fresh and gives you a sense of accomplishment. The abundance of items available to each class means that not every player has to follow the same play style and can find their own niche within the game. I hope you have as much fun with this title as I surely had!

It reminded me of Unreal Tournament. Even though Fortnite supposed to be sort of a successor for Unreal Tournament since both of them developed by Epic Games, but TF2 still holds the basic formula to make this type of game fun and enjoyable.
Still a great games years later
Sure, you don't ask a woman her age, you don't ask a man his salary but most importantly you don't ask the tf2 community how this game is still alive.
I'd say it's a pretty decent game. Learning curve is pretty darn steep and updates/balances are few. But hey, at least there are many hats.

juego gracioso , muy divertido , donde el jugador tiene que alcanzar distintos objetivos segun la partida que elija mediante el uso de distintos personajes cada uno con sus habilidades y sus gracias. lo mejor del juego que complementa muy bien con su jugabilidad y el humor que se mezcla con disparos, son las fraces y el echo de que cada vez que se juega y se avanza de nivel , uno va desbloqueando algunos accesorios de los personajes de team fortress lo que impulsa a jugar horas y horas sin para. DISPAROS Y DIVERSION POR TODOS LADOS WOHOO
One of the best games i have ever played.Would definitely recommend it.
its good. however, dont play it

I am a 45 yo father, probably one of the oldest people playing this game. I am a single farther to my Son, who is 14 now. My son got this game for Christmas in 2021 from his uncle, so we installed it on his computer and he started playing. By the end of the week he had 24 hours on this game. This was horrible for me, as it was already hard for me to find ways to spend time with my son, as he is always out with his friends or just watching YouTube. So I decided to make a Steam account and get this game to see if I could maybe play alongside him. I loaded into the game, picked my character and started playing but I was stuck on what you where supposed to do. I asked my Son for help and he hosted a game for me to join. I loved it as it was the best time I had spent with my Son since my wife had died. This game has ever since brought me and my son closer again and now we actually spend time together outside the house together as well. This game reminded me that there's fun to be had in everything, and it has brought both me and my Son many happy memories.
Wonderful game, about half of the community is great. Love that game and will play again as soon as I am done with other games

Можно весело провести время, стать волком с аллеи шапок и заработать миллионы на ключах, чтобы изучить все характеристики оружия и др. штук нужна степень доктора наук, лагает даже на суперкомпьютерах, старики уже умерли, а молодежь уже не та. В целом, норм.

Игра действительно хорошая,хоть она и старовата,но до сих пор играбельна,всем советую поиграть,куча режимов игры делает эту игру ещё лучше,каждый скин имеет свой бафф и дебафф из-за чего игра вполне сбалансирована.
This game is so good that it got me addicted and my wallet is now empty.
This game never dies, better than overwatch in every aspect, isn't a demanding game. I hope more new players would come and play tf2 or the veterans come back.
